requests.title: Allow CAS Users without an assigned Barcode to Issue Digitization Requests

comments.body: Requests to illiad should make the barcode value optional for both the creation of user accounts and the creation of requests. Digitization Requests submitted to ReCAP will still need a barcode value to pass through. We will need to obtain a barcode from the Resource sharing department that can be used for all requests this segment of users will submit. Will follow up with RS sharing staff this week.
